name: Lapyrinthe
description:
This is my first game ever.

Lapyrinthe

It all started when I was trying to make a labyrinth using the Maze Generation algorithm Recursive backtracker (but not really).

I ended up making it a full game to get the hand on pygame before making something a bit more complex.

Everything is done by me except sfx and music, which are credited on the readme.md

Have fun.

OH, and the game is release for Linux, Windows, and OSX (not sure it works as I don't have any apple device).

PS: if there is any problems, just make an Issue on github. Thx
